meanings.definition: A person who attends a show or performance.
meanings.sent1: The showgoer clapped enthusiastically at the end of the play.
meanings.sent2: The showgoer bought a ticket to see the musical.
meanings.sent3: The showgoer chuckled at the comedian's jokes.
meanings.sent4: The showgoer was a shining star in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The showgoer's eyes sparkled with excitement during the performance.
